title: Validate 'eventforwarder-mp-grpc' endpoint configured and initialize correctly
custom_steps:
- Verify file -> cat /opt/ns/common/remote/eventforwarder-mp-grpc
{
  "name": "eventforwarder-mp-grpc",
  "host": "eventforwarder-mp-grpc",
  "port": 50051,
  "protocol" : "tcp",
  "kind": "BALANCED"
}

- Verify logs at the time service starts
custom_expected:
- Logs should  show eventforwarder-mp-grpc initialize correctly and connection is successful 
- Verify no issue with service startup
